CustomField.description: This field is marked as ‘True’ manually to indicate that the customer is escalated and must be urgently prioritized. Marking this field as ‘True’ pushes the carrier order to the top of assignment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Mark this field as ‘True’ to indicate that the customer is escalated and must be urgently prioritized. Marking this field as ‘True’ pushes the carrier order to the top of assignment.
CustomField.label: Escalated Customer
